title: What do Alaskans make of the geopolitical circus arriving in their city?
content_snippet:
"Putin is supposed to be in jail, and he just comes to Alaska like that."
Hanna Correa is amongst a sea of Alaskans waving Ukrainian flags on road leading into Anchorage.

title: New Israeli rules stopping critical aid getting into Gaza, charities say
content_snippet:

title: EU sends wildfire help to Spain as death toll rises
content_snippet:
The European Union has sent two firefighting planes to Spain to help battle raging wildfires, after the country activated the bloc's disaster assistance mechanism for the first time.

title: 'Our children are dying': Rare footage shows plight of civilians in besieged Sudan city
content_snippet:
The women at the community kitchen in the besieged Sudanese city of el-Fasher are sitting in huddles of desperation.
"Our children are dying before our eyes," one of them tells the BBC.
